input.sentences: a group of environmentalists volunteered to help the small town .
the entire group got a lot of satisfaction from working with the people of the small town .
output.sentences: Today our group was going to volunteer in the community.
We decided to clean up the area by digging up dead plants.
Afterwards we started to plant new trees.
It was a very nice day to spend together.
We are so glad we had the opportunity to make our community a better place.
